name: Mushroom Rainbow Chard Shallot Soup
description: A hearty meal, packed full of nutrients
recipeIngredient: 10  rainbow chard (ribs cut and leaves chopped, use only soft and thin ribs. compost the thick stems)
1 cup cooked elbows or small pasta
1  cup water (or more) (reserve from the pasta or vegetable stock or plain water)

recipeInstructions.text: In a deep large pan, add oil, heat at medium heat and spread to cover the pan.
recipeInstructions.name: In a deep large pan, add oil, heat at medium heat and spread to cover the pan.

recipeInstructions.text: Add chopped mushrooms, garlic, chard ribs and shallots and cook on medium low, stirring occasionally for 4-6 minutes or until mushrooms begin to brown on the edges.
recipeInstructions.name: Add chopped mushrooms, garlic, chard ribs and shallots and cook on medium low, stirring occasionally for 4-6 minutes or until mushrooms begin to brown on the edges.

recipeInstructions.text: Add in the chard leaves and cook for another 2 minutes until the chard begins to wilt.
recipeInstructions.name: Add in the chard leaves and cook for another 2 minutes until the chard begins to wilt.

recipeInstructions.text: Add in the water, herbs, salt and pepper to taste, and pasta. Taste and adjust.
recipeInstructions.name: Add in the water, herbs, salt and pepper to taste, and pasta. Taste and adjust.

recipeInstructions.text: Bring to boil (partially covered 5 mins) and cook on low for 2-3 minutes or until the soup reaches desired consistency.
recipeInstructions.name: Bring to boil (partially covered 5 mins) and cook on low for 2-3 minutes or until the soup reaches desired consistency.

recipeInstructions.text: Serve hot garnished with green onions or herbs of choice.
recipeInstructions.name: Serve hot garnished with green onions or herbs of choice.
